title: If these were your children. - Part 2: Partners in the search
brief_description: Panel members Charles Brown, Amy Hostler, Leonard W. Mayo, and John Rose discuss situations demonstrated in Part 1, talking about the children’s behaviour while flashbacks bring significant scenes into focus.
